ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Certainly it is to Us they will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: To Us is surely their returning;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely to Us is their return;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To Us they will all return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed only towards Us is their return
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, to Us will be their return;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely to Us is their turning back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Truly, to Us is their return;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! unto Us is their return
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Certainly, it is to Us that they will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily Unto us is their reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed to Us will be their return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For to Us will be their return;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, to Us will be their return;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, to Us they shall return,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, to Us is their return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [88:25] Truly to Us will be their return, their coming back after death,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! unto Us is their return) in the Hereafter.
